---
name: Reproducible Bug or Previously Discussed Topic
about: Only for reproducible bugs or topics that have been discussed before.
---

Is this a reproducible bug or a previously discussed topic? If not, please open a new [Github Discussion](https://github.com/orgs/griptape-ai/discussions/new/choose) or [Discord Forum Post](https://discord.com/channels/1096466116672487547/1316127177103642674).
